https://tmrev.io/movie/130506-Boerenpsalm 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jwy4KA3o9l0ATxMdEoo8WVb3ZUJ.jpg This heimat-movie after a novel by Felix Timmermans is about the at first sight idyllic, but actually tragical life of Wortel, a peasant in a pre-war Belgian village, who has a hard time accepting the curate’s assurance it’s all part of God’s grand plan when his loved ones keep coming to harm. Boerenpsalm
